__e: No, the pilot managed an emergency landing, but... the plane broke apart when it hit the ground.
Look, I don't know if you guys heard but we had to make an emergency landing at the airport.
They suspect something was amiss about their emergency landing.
They suspect something was amiss about their emergency landing.
Look, I don't know if you guys heard but we had to make an emergency landing at the airport.
They probably tried to make an emergency landing on this planet.
There's no way it crash-landed here.
If he knew he couldn't make it back to the ship, his only hope would be an emergency landing.
You mean the man you sent into anaphylactic shock so the plane had to make an emergency landing, causing me to miss my ex-boyfriend's wedding?
Tom, we've scanned the area. There appears to be a small landing field about ten kilometers ahead of you.
There's an airfield 10 clicks from here.
I'm not sure of my bearings and I must make a visual landing immediately.
We did a scan of the landing field, and looking at the Imperial security, I just don't see us living long enough to get near those ships.
Nonsense! Sure, your landing was a bit rocky but once you were up in the air you were fine, just fine!
Landing is launching. It's the same. Didn't you learn that in training?
